subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
This is Mr. Edwin Castro. I am the recent winner of $2.05 billion in a Powerball jackpot on the Feb 14, 2023 drawing. I understand that you may be surprised to receive an email from me, but I assure you that it is with great joy and a philanthropic spirit that I am reaching out to you today. I want to inform you that I'm donating $10 Millions to 5 random individuals from any part of the world and if you get this email then your email was selected after a spin ball.
As part of my commitment to sharing my newfound wealth, I have decided to donate $10 million to five random individuals from anywhere in the world. Through a meticulous selection process, your email address was chosen as one of the fortunate recipients after a spin ball. To verify my winnings visit the official Guinness World Records website at the following link: https:/ /www.guinnessworldrecords.com/news/2023/2/winner-of-biggest-ever-lottery-jackpot-revealed-after-bagging-2-billion-ticket-738096
I have just started my international charitable donation campaign, and I will be giving a donation of $10 million each to improve the lives and careers of (5) lucky individuals from any part of the world.
Firstly, I want to express my deepest gratitude for your willingness to accept this donation and support our charitable cause. Your kind heart and dedication to helping others are truly commendable. Prior to winning the lottery, I never believed in luck, but the same fortune that brought me this incredible wealth has led me to you. The goal is to make a positive impact on the lives of deserving individuals and families, such as yours. It has been a life-altering event, and I am now compelled to use this incredible wealth for a significant purpose. In that aspect, I have decided to bless five families by offering each one of them $10 million. I firmly believe that sharing my fortune with those in need is the real purpose of wealth. Your email address was submitted to us by the Email Internet Management teams as an email user and as part of our donation list. After careful consideration, you have been selected to receive the sum of $10,000,000.00 to ensure the smooth processing and tra
 nsfer of these funds, I have enlisted the assistance of our accountant agent, Mr. Edward Manzi jr, the Chief Banking Officer of Fidelity Bank. and he will be overseeing the financial aspects of this process..
I understand that $10,000,000.00 might not be a significant amount for you or your business, but I genuinely believe that it can make a remarkable difference not only in your life but also in your ability to support others in need, particularly during these challenging times. We have chosen you to be a part of this blessing, and we trust that these funds will enhance the financial well-being of your family. I kindly request that you keep this generous donation confidential until the transfer is complete.
To expedite the swift release of your donation, kindly get in touch with Mr. Edward Manzi jr, the Chief Banking Officer at  Fidelity Bank Headquarters, using the contact information provided below. Due to his busy schedule, I urge you to reach out to him at your earliest convenience.
Contact Person: Mr. Edward Manzi jr
Email:( 
edmanzijr1@mail.com
 )
Upon contacting Mr. Edward Manzi jr, provide him with your DONATION CODE [ CASTR9244578WIN ]. This is essential for a seamless and efficient process.
It is crucial that you comply with all instructions given by Mr. Edward Manzi jr the CHIEF BANKING OFFICER of Fidelity Bank Headquarters today because the new payment of US$10 Million signed in your name is 100% genuine with due process of law.
Once again, I sincerely hope that this donation will bring happiness and prosperity to you and your loved ones. I strongly urge you to get in touch with Mr. Edward Manzi jr as soon as possible to express your interest. Once again, I extend my warmest congratulations to you for being selected, and I wish you an early joyous celebration.
Best Regards,
Mr. Edwin Castro
Remain Blessed From The Mr. Edwin Castro Fund Donation Familiesre
Note: If you happen to find this email in your SPAM/JUNK folder, it may be due to restrictions imposed by your Internet Service Provider. Kindly consider moving it to your inbox.

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Edwin Castro,

Thank you for reaching out to me and congratulations on your recent Powerball jackpot win! I must admit, receiving an email from a lottery winner is quite surprising, but I'm intrigued by your offer to donate millions to random individuals around the world.

I appreciate your commitment to sharing your newfound wealth and making a positive impact on the lives of others. It's truly admirable. Can you please provide more details about the selection process? How were the recipients chosen? I'm curious to know how my email address was selected among so many others.

You mentioned that Mr. Edward Manzi Jr., the Chief Banking Officer of Fidelity Bank, will be overseeing the financial aspects of this process. Could you tell me more about his role and how he will ensure the smooth processing and transfer of funds?

While I must admit that this donation seems too good to be true, I am open to learning more about it. However, before proceeding further, could you please provide some additional verification or documentation regarding your winnings? This would help alleviate any concerns and ensure transparency in the process.

Thank you once again for considering me as one of the fortunate recipients of your generous donation. I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Re: Re:   Hello,
body:
ATTENTION: Denise

Dear sir,

The management of Bank wishes to inform you that after our investigation, we have confirmed that we received the sum of Amount: US$10 Million) by Mr. Edwin Castro,

You need to choose from the following options to receive your fund;

I) Bank to Bank transfer
2.) Opening an account for you and you will have access to the account to transfer to your choice bank account from the account we open for you.
3) Certified Cheque Draft
4) ATM card.

Let us know after you make your choice so that we can proceed.

Congratulation once again

Thanks as we wait for your quick response
Regards

Mr. Edward Manzi jr
edmanzijr1@mail.com

subject: ATTENTION: Denise
body:

Mr. Edward Manzi jr

subject: Re: Re:   Hello,
body:
Dear Mr. Edward Manzi Jr.,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer of funds. I appreciate your prompt response and willingness to assist me. I would like to gather some more information before making a decision.

1. For the Bank to Bank transfer option, could you please provide details about the process? How long does it usually take for the funds to be transferred? Are there any fees or charges associated with this method?

2. If I choose to open an account, how secure is the account? What are the requirements for opening an account, and what documents would I need to provide?

3. Regarding the Certified Cheque Draft option, how would I receive the cheque? Is it sent via mail or courier service? Are there any additional costs involved in receiving and cashing the cheque?

4. Lastly, if I opt for an ATM card, how can I ensure its safe delivery? Will there be any PIN or activation process required upon receiving the card?

I look forward to your response so that we can proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Re: ATTENTION: Denise
body:
Dear Mr. Edward Manzi Jr.,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer of funds. I appreciate your prompt response and willingness to assist me. However, before proceeding, I have a few questions that I would like to clarify.

1. Could you please provide more details about the source of the funds? How did Mr. Edwin Castro come into possession of such a large sum?

2. What are the specific benefits and advantages of each option mentioned (Bank to Bank transfer, Opening an account, Certified Cheque Draft, ATM card)? Which option do you recommend and why?

3. Are there any fees or charges associated with each option? If so, what are they and how can they be paid?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Re: Re: Re:   Hello,
body:
ATTENTION:: Denise

Dear sir,

The management of Bank hereby wish to inform you that you have choosing wisely by choosing transfer because it is the easiest and more convenient way to transact funds.

Therefore, we have two different types of transferring funds. One has no transaction limit and can transfer your US$10 Million at once, it can transact large sum of money at once and the other one has limit transaction, which can transact from $500,000,00 to $1 Million daily.

You are require to pay ($485. 00) for the one that has no transaction limit while you are require to pay ($270.00) for the one that has limit transaction.
You can now choose between the two and we can send the receiver's details to make the payment and immediately we confirm the payment, the transfer will be done and the payment receipt will be sent to you.

I will get back to you for the Check Draft and ATM card delivery


Congratulations once again
Regards
Mr. Edward Manzi Jr

subject: Re: Re: Re:   Hello,
body:
Dear ; Denise

Regards to ATM card and check draft delivery by Courier means

DHL will you cost: $250 by 6hours
FedEx will cost you $200 by 24 hours
USPS will cost you $150 by 24hours
UPS will cost you $ 1,50 by 72 hours
It's only Top Chrono that's $100 72hours
Make your choice and let us know the one you choose

Your urgent response is your highly needed : Denise
Regards
Edward Manzi Jr

subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re:   Hello,
body:
ATTENTION:: Denise

Dear sir,

The transfer access code fee is that 485USD. This is to obtain an access code of your online account from the central bank. This video is what you will use to login to your online account. Yes 1 million USD is the maximum amount you can transfer per a day.

Also, your full information is required for the securing of the access code eg Full name, Address, phone number and WhatsApp number.
Regards
Mr. Edward Manzi Jr
